regions.description: Comma separated list of region ID's or codes.

regressionRegions.description: Comma separated list of regression region ID's or codes.

statisticgroups.description: Comma separated list of statistic group ID's or codes.

regressiontypes.description: Comma separated list of regression type ID's or codes.

id.description: Unique identifier, used for identifying unique resource.

entity.description: Data entity to submit in the requesting body

regressionRegionID.description: Comma separated list of regression region ID's.

entities.description: Array of data entities to submit in the requesting body

region.description: Region 2 letter abbrev or ID of requested region.

unitsystem.description: ID representing the measuring unit system, 1=Metric, 2=US Customary, 3=Universal.

extensions.description: Unique extension code, used for activating internal extension methods

regressions.description: Comma separated list of regression type ID's or codes.
